meanings.definition: A small gathering of people engaged in informal conversation.
meanings.sent1: During lunch, our little klatches by the water cooler always make the day brighter.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood klatches in the park are a great way to catch up with friends.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the klatches about old stories had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the klatches of street vendors created a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The cozy cafe was filled with the comforting sound of klatches among friends.
